Draft proposal for simplifying country-level planning process where necessary finalized for Secretary-General
Outcome report on the Unified Services Roadmap released, outlining progress, results and suggested next steps
Outcomes on assessment for integration of basic ICT services and payroll, human resources, finance, and ERP systems released
Final outcomes of the assessment on country-level unified service backbone released
Common back-office (CBO) tracking tool and self starter reporting methodology for new CBOs released
Proposal for harmonized in-country logistics, with initial application in Afghanistan, Haiti, Gaza (OPT), Somalia and Sudan finalized
ICT consolidation proposal endorsed by CEB
Portfolio of 3 high-impact technology acceleration use cases proposed to the UN80 Steering Committee
